name: Castiglione I - Costes x Liaigre Capsule Collection
description: Designed to invite relaxation, this large sofa can be found in the boudoirs or dressing rooms of many Costes' rooms. It comes in two versions: a straight sofa or a corner sofa. Its design exudes sobriety, combining button-tufted leather with silk or mohair velvet, adding a touch of sophistication. The sofa rests on a blackened wood base.
